title: e-Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Understanding the Neural Mechanisms of Inverted Learning: Experiments for Novice Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Distinguish the two subprocesses of backward learning (stimulus-reinforcement association formation and emotional transition)
Explain the functions of the dorsolateral prefrontal cortex (DLPFC), orbitofrontal cortex (OFC), and other regions identified in neuroimaging studies
Design experimental tasks in resource-constrained technical environments to analyze backward learning mechanisms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
